2013-07-11

One shot: South American Way

We watched the Joan Crawford Mildred Pierce last night, the two (non-Joan) high points of the film were the always fantastic Eve Arden and this lovely version of South American Way.

Here's the wonderful bit from Radio Days of the family dancing to Carmen Miranda's version

Here's Marlene Dietrich singing (something that sounds like) it in German

And a nice 78 of Carmen Miranda
